rules_text:
Buried Colossus enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{8}{GW}: Buried Colossus becomes a 8/8 green and white Cyclops creature until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to green and white. Activate only once each turn.
notes:
Planename: Theros
Theros: Age of Trax Reprint
